Program running modes (modes.py)¶

modes.modeClass(args)¶

Mode used for classifing images using a previously trained SVM. Classification results are diplayed with calculated probabilities.

The parameters that are required in commandline arguments are: photoPath, modelPath

Parameters

args – The parsed command line arguments

modes.modeGen(args)¶

Mode used for generating training and testing data for later use in the tuning or training mode

The parameters that are required in commandline arguments are: dataPath, dataPrefix, method, trainTrue, trainTrue

The optional parameters are: CoALBP, testSpoof, testSpoof

The data is generated using getTrainingData from the data handling module

Parameters

args – The parsed command line arguments

modes.modeTrain(args)¶

Mode used for training an SVM with given parameters. Training results are printed to a console. The SVM is then saved to a file for later use (if specifies in parameters)

The parameters that are required in commandline arguments are: dataPath, dataPrefix, kernel, C, gamma

The optional parameters are: modelPath, method, verbose

Parameters

args – The parsed command line arguments

modes.modeTune(args)¶

Mode used for tuning (ie finding the best model parameters) the SVM using a grid search. Tuning results are printed to a console and to a log file (if specifies in parameters). The SVM is then saved to a file for later use (if specifies in parameters)

The parameters that are required in commandline arguments are: dataPath, dataPrefix, kernel

The optional parameters are: modelPath, method, log

Parameters

args – The parsed command line arguments
